keyboard_key_release.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_key_release.htm+html.body.p:87-3
keyboard_key_release: With this function you can simulate the release of any key on the keyboard. The function will take a keycode value as returned by the function ord() (only capital letters from A-Z or numbers from 0-9), or any of the vk_* constants listed on the main Keyboard Input page.

keyboard_key_release.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_key_release.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:100-9
keyboard_key_release: The key to simulate a release of.

keyboard_key_release.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_key_release.htm+html.body.p:111-3
keyboard_key_release: This will simulate a spacebar release.
